sentence: Despite being in the minority, House Democrats are working tirelessly  to push back against Trump's hostile government takeover by litigating  his illegal actions, introducing legislation to curb his powers, and  mobilizing the public against his destructive agenda.
House Democrats are focused on driving down costs and making life  more affordable.
House Democrats are united against this corrupt bill and will keep  fighting to protect America's healthcare.

House Democrats came to Congress ready to work with our Republican  colleagues to lower the cost of eggs, take on price gouging, expand the  child tax credit, build more housing, and put the pocketbooks of  working families first.
That is what House Democrats are continuing to fight hard to  achieve.

All of our  constituents deserve better, and House Democrats are here to fight back  against this cruelty.

House Democrats stood firm for more than 40 days to support a budget  that addressed the rising cost of healthcare.
